Pre-Game Insights: Germany meets Hungary in the second round of Group A games at the 2024 UEFA European Championship, coming off a 5-1 win over Scotland, while Hungary suffered a 3-1 defeat by Switzerland.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played at 12:00 PM ET on Wednesday, June 19, at the Mercedes-Benz Arena in Stuttgart, Germany.
Others: Kai Havertz has been involved in one match for Germany in UEFA Euro, producing one goal and one assist. Jamal Musiala has one goal in one match for Germany in UEFA Euro. Florian Wirtz has one goal for Germany in UEFA Euro, in one match. Joshua Kimmich has one assist for Germany in UEFA Euro (but no goals). Dominik Szoboszlai has yet to score in one match for Hungary in UEFA European Championship play, but has one assist. In UEFA European Championship play (one appearance), Barnabas Varga has one goal (first in UEFA European Championship play) for Hungary.
